channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Faculty of Law: student reception on Friday, 22 March 2024
item.description: On Friday, 22 March 2024 the student reception for Law and Sciences of Legal Services programmes will only be available either via Microsoft Teams (please use the ID number 371 209 231 359 at the following link) or by calling the phone number 02-50312473, from 9.30am to 11am.%0A

item.title: Call for the C1 Advanced (CAE) exam on 14+15 May 2024 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English C1 Advanced (CPE) exam scheduled on 14+15 May 2024.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the C2 Proficiency (CPE) exam on 15+16 May 2024
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English C2 Proficiency (CPE) exam scheduled on 15+16 May 2024.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Stai sano!
item.description: Saturday, 23 March 2024. With talks in the Great Hall and booths in the courtyards, a day full of entertaining and interactive activities for everyone aged 0 to 99. A smart event to find out how to best take care of yourself.%0A%0Aüîó Sign up for the event%0AüìÑ Flyer

item.title: Call for the A2 - B1 CELI i exams on 8 May 2024
item.description: The call is open to register for the Italian language for foreigners CELi i exams (Italian Language Certificate for Immigrants) - level A2 and B1 - taking place on 8 May 2024.%0AN.B.: the seats for the B1 CELI i exam are sold out.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Study awards (type A-B-C) in memory of Professor Clementina Gatti. a.y. 2023/2024
item.description: For the academic year 2023/2024, the University is giving out three study awards (type A-B-C) in memory of Professor Clementina Gatti.%0AFor further information, check out the calls for applications on the dedicated pages.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it
